views.markdown:
This item is now Free.

Compatible with iOS 8, 9 and 10

With iOS 11 Apple "reinvented" the control center. The new control center now greatly increases its usability by utilising 3D touch to allow access to more features.

For devices without 3D touch capabilities a long press on any 3D touch active section will act as a 3D touch.

ControlCenterXI allows you to "update without updating" and experience the iOS 11 control center.

ControlCenterXI also includes Noctis, FlipControlCenter and "light mode" to better match the iOS 10 "light" aesthetic.

You can configure ControlCenterXI via the Eleven preferences.

ControlCenterXI is part of the Eleven project by LaughingQuoll and Antique_Dev.

Not compatible with Horseshoe, it will be uninstalled.

This item is now Free. 1. Fixed polus support.


1. Fixed licence issues.
2. Other small fixes.
Now compatible with iOS 8 through iOS 10.


1. Added audio source button (located under volume slider)
2. Added option for single haptic buzz, default is two.
3. Added option for album artwork to be shown behind music view.
4. Added option for usual CC card backing.
5. Added option to disable CC via preferences.
6. Added Polus support. Allows for customisation of all toggles using Polus configuration.
7. Animation performance improvements.
8. Fixed heating issues.
9. Fixed pause button / fast forward button icons being incorrect in light mode.
10. Fixed night shift and noctis toggle buttons ignoring light CC mode.
11. Fixed volume HUD appearing at random times.
12. Fixed missized media controls.
13. Fixed stutter when entering settings 3D touch menu.
14. Fixed brightness randomly adjusting.
15. Fixed misaligned toggles in settings 3D touch menu.
16. Fixed control center showing behind 3D touch menus.
Conflicts with Horseshoe, it will be uninstalled.
